Formatting for the xsl:number action.

Constructor Detail

XslNumberFormat

public XslNumberFormat(java.lang.String format,
                       java.lang.String lang,
                       boolean isAlphabetic,
                       java.lang.String groupSeparator,
                       int groupSize)
Create a new number formatting object.
Parameters:
format - format string as specified by the XSLT draft
lang - language for alphanumeric numbering
isAlphabetic - resolves ambiguity for alphanumeric numbering
groupSeparator - separator between number grouping
groupSize - digits between group separator
